mapper.select: select a.chatmember,a.chatroomno,a.user1,a.user2,m.name,m.address,m.profile,cm.chatmessage from chatmember a Left Join member m ON a.user2 = m.memberno Left Join (SELECT chatroomno, chatmessage,chatmessageno FROM ( SELECT chatroomno, chatmessage,chatmessageno , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY chatroomno ORDER BY chatmessageno DESC) as RowIdx FROM chatmessage ) t1 WHERE RowIdx = 1) cm ON a.chatroomno = cm.chatroomno where user1 = #{user1}
